name: Netlicensing
body:
### Licensing For Your .NET Application
NetLicensing makes it easy for you to create a licensing solution for your .NET Windows application. Clone our git repository on GitHub by running the following command below (or use the GIT GUI on Windows):

```
$ git clone https://github.com/iandun/NetLicensing.git
```

### Product Keys
NetLicensing can easily verify product keys

### Software Licensing
NetLicensing can easily create and verify software licenses that can't be used on more than one computer

### Authors and Contributors

The project admin is @iandun.

Would you like to join? Contact Ian at [corinthianmonthly@hotmail.com](mailto:corinthianmonthly@hotmail.com). 

### Documentation
NetLicensing is completely documented using Markdown. Just go in the Documentation folder at the root of the repository and look at tableofcontents.md
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
